name: smart-tax_react
description: smart-tax_react generated with Skaffolder React - Node JS template

scripts.install: cd client && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install
scripts.start: concurrently --raw "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.build: concurrently --raw "cd server && yarn run build" "cd client && yarn run build"
scripts.debug: concurrently --raw "cd server && yarn run debug" "cd client && yarn run build"
